title: Judge Calls for Trial on McKinsey’s Bankruptcy Disclosures
text:
A Texas bankruptcy judge teed up a trial intended to end a long-running dispute between McKinsey & Co. and AlixPartners founder Jay Alix, saying the outcome of the trial will be “the ultimate career ender” for one of the two sides.

The trial will center on whether McKinsey was qualified to work as an adviser on Westmoreland Coal Co.’s chapter 11 case, which was filed last year and largely concluded after just four months. In calling for a full evidentiary trial in February, Judge David Jones of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court...
description: A Texas bankruptcy judge teed up a trial intended to end a long-running dispute between McKinsey and AlixPartners founder Jay Alix, saying the outcome of the trial will be “the ultimate career ender” for one of the two sides.
